alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 528 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles south of Dillon to 8 miles northeast of Lima to 11 miles southwest of Monida. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lima, Monida and Snowline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
